Reviews.Title: AAAA++++
Reviews.Author: Tracy L. Moore
Reviews.Content: Great....I love it and I searched for awhile before I chose this one..AppleIPad got nothing on this baby but their price. Highly reccommend

ProductInfo.Features:
10.1 inch 16:9 IPS LED capacitive 10-point panel 1024 x 600
16 GB Storage (expandable upto 32GB)
Dual Camera, HDMI output, inbuilt speakers, WiFi + Bluetooth ready
Supports 1080P HD video playback, 1080P decoding and HDMI video output
3D Gaming Accelerator comes installed. Comes with Google Play Store, Netflix, Youtube, Facebook, Skype and other popular apps.
ProductInfo.Name: 10.1" Inch Dual Core Android Tablet PC w/ 16GB+Dual Camera+HDMI+Bluetooth+Google Play-Pumpkin X
